How to modify architectures of fusion modelsÔÉÅ

This tutorial will show you how to modify the architectures of fusion models.

PROBLEMs:

  1. resetting the layer sizes won‚Äôt also reset the fused layers, so we need to reset the fused layers after resetting the layer sizes manually
